title: （紧急啊！)躲猫猫玩家没权限啊！
txt_content: 谁能帮我http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-184780-1-1.html这个插件的这个blockhunt.player这个权限弄好！然后发给我啊！或者交给我怎么弄！感激不尽啊！

replies.author: xiacca2
replies.txt_content: 如果你的玩家在builder 组你就输入/mangaddp builder blockhunt.player和/mangaddp builder disguisecraft.object.block.*

xiacca2 发表于 2015-8-28 10:53
如果你的玩家在builder 组你就输入/mangaddp builder blockhunt.player和/mangaddp builder disguisecraft. ...
QQ聊行吗？
